name: EGGSCAPE
summary:
LISTEN: BE AN EGG.

BE AN EGG NOW!!. 

BEFORE IT'S TOO LATE

These eggs are CRAZY!!! 🤪🥚  
yes, indeed. These eggs are quite insane.

Full MULTIPLAYER shooter, runner, BAZOOKA-er with level builder.  
Eggscape has the most amazing BATTLEPASS of all games in VR!

The most absurdly fun cosmetics. **Weapons, power ups, the best rewards.

New levels coming all the time 🌟

In this game you control INSANE LITTLE EGGS 🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚🥚

Multiple game modes**
Fully immersive level...
